text: And they said to him, Behold now, there are with thy servants fifty men 2. 16 Gr. sons of strength Hebraism.of strength: let them go now, and seek thy lord: 2. 16 Gr. lest at any time.peradventure the Spirit of the Lord has taken him up, and cast him into Jordan, or on one of the mountains, or on one of the hills. And Elisaie said, Ye shall not send.
